Posts.Content:
hi,
i am 21 yrs old. for the past 10 days i have been experiencing sudden pain in left breast and spinal cord. it lasts for about
 1 or 2 minutes. mostly the pain occurs during night time. my mom had breast cancer in left breast. she had surgery and medications. now she is back to normal. am afraid that i may have breast cancer. pls help me in finding out what may be my problem.
Posts.Title: pain in left breast and spinal cord
